lead_paragraph: N.H.L. Commissioner Gary Bettman formally added an outdoor game to the 2007-8 season. The New Year’s Day game between Buffalo and Pittsburgh is expected to break league attendance records by attracting 74,000 fans to Ralph Wilson Stadium, the Buffalo Bills’ home field in suburban Orchard Park. A normal Jan. 1 snowfall in Buffalo is about a tenth of an inch, according to National Weather Service records. Temperatures have varied from 0 degrees in 1970 to 63 in 1985.
